translation.en: -[man] Was the drive all right? -[Leda] Yeah.
[man] Must've been backed up on the National Road after Corinth.
translation.es: Debe haber habido tránsito en la Nacional después de Corinto.

translation.en: Have you been waiting a long time?
-[Leda] Sorry, I had a late start. -No, let me. I got it. [grunts]
No, I take care of it. For 30 years now.
translation.es: No, solo la cuido. Desde hace 30 años.
- Vaya. - Y otros lugares más en la isla.

translation.en: Uh, make yourself at home and I'll be back with the other ones.
translation.es: Póngase cómoda, ya regreso con las otras.

translation.en: Here you go. That about does it.
translation.es: Aquí tiene. Creo que ya está.

translation.en: I'll turn the air on in the… in the bedroom.
translation.es: Encenderé el aire en el dormitorio.

translation.en: [Leda] Oh, no, I prefer the fresh air.
[man] Well, you know, let me just cool it down for you a little bit.
translation.es: Deje que se refresque un rato.

translation.en: -If you wanna… -[beeps] …turn it off later, be my guest.
Your breakfast, uh, is covered at the bar downstairs.
translation.es: Su desayuno será en el bar de abajo.

translation.en: -[Leda] Oh, breakfast in a bar. -[foghorn blaring]

translation.es: - No es todo el tiempo. - Bien.

translation.en: Or, what are you, a teacher?
-Um, can I get you a tip? -No, no. Please.
[man] Let me know if I can do anything for you. [Leda] Thank you.
Excuse me, do you need some help?
It's just, you're in the sun. I could move your chair if you'd like.
translation.es: Está bajo el sol. Puedo mover la reposera si desea.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I am in the sun.
[young man] Can I move your chair under the umbrella?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Le pongo la silla bajo la sombrilla?

translation.en: I work at the beach house, so…
Uh, just let me know if you need anything.
There's, uh, Nespresso and ice pops and things.
translation.es: Hay una Nespresso, helados y otras cosas.

translation.en: What ice pops have you got?
[man] Can you take it easy? Hey!
Guys, there's a fucking person here.
translation.es: Chicos, hay una persona aquí, carajo.

translation.en: -Sorry. -[kid 1] Can you get me ice cream?

translation.es: - Juguemos allá. - No es mi problema.

translation.en: [man] Yeah, it is your fucking problem, man!
-[woman] Okay, so… -[Will] Want some ice cream?
I told the kids today. You didn't have them the other day.
translation.es: Les prometí helado. No tenías el otro día.

translation.en: -You see that ice cream? That ice cream. -That ice cream. Okay. Great.
translation.es: - ¿Ves ese? Ese helado. - Ese helado. Genial.

translation.en: No, but also like the rainbow colored. You have that?
translation.es: No, y el de colores. ¿Tienes ese?

translation.en: [woman] You didn't even go. He didn't even…
Why did dinosaurs die before us?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los dinosaurios murieron antes que nosotros?

translation.en: Do they go and dry up?
Nina, you gotta put something on her 'cause it's cold now.
translation.es: Nina, debes ponerle algo porque ahora hace frío.

translation.en: You gotta put something on her.
Do you think that I'm ever gonna get my doll?
translation.es: ¿Te parece que alguna vez tendré mi muñeca?

translation.en: [young man in English] Fuck you! Motherfucker.
translation.es: ¡Vete a la mierda! Hijo de puta.

translation.en: -I think Neni wants more. -[Nina] Yes. Yes, please.
translation.es: - Creo que Neni quiere más. - Sí, por favor.

translation.en: -Can I have a glass of water, please? -Yes. One second.
translation.es: - ¿Me das agua, por favor? - Sí. Un segundo.

translation.en: [girls] Don't let it break. Peel it like a snake.
translation.es: Que no se parta. Pélala como una serpiente larga.

translation.en: [girl 1] This one is a round one.
-[gasps] Should we keep it in a cage? -[young Leda] Isn't that nice?
translation.es: - ¿La guardamos en una jaula? - ¿No es linda?

translation.en: -[girl 1] Know what we should do? -[young Leda] What?
[girl 1] We should stick googly eyes on his face,
translation.es: Deberíamos pegarle ojos en la cara,

translation.en: and we should put him in a cage and decorate the cage.
translation.es: ponerla en una jaula y decorarla.

translation.en: -[Will] Let me know if you need anything. -Thank you.
I was just thinking of calling you. Just got in from the beach.
translation.es: Justo pensé en llamarte. Acabo de volver de la playa.

translation.en: Why did you go to someone you don't know?
translation.es: ¿Por qué fuiste a alguien que no conoces?

translation.en: It just gets really dry when you dye it so much.
translation.es: Solo se seca mucho cuando lo tiñes tanto.

translation.en: I sometimes put a teaspoon of olive oil…
translation.es: A veces me pongo una cucharada de aceite de oliva.

translation.en: I'm on holiday. I'm looking out over the most--
translation.es: Estoy de vacaciones. Estoy mirando a una…

translation.en: You guys just move down to the last umbrella, okay? Thank you.
translation.es: Váyanse a la última sombrilla, ¿sí? Gracias.

translation.en: And he'll get you a couple of sodas. Thank you very much.
translation.es: Él les llevará refrescos. Muchas gracias.

translation.en: This should've been done before. So this lady also has to move.
translation.es: Debimos hacerlo antes. Esa señora también.

translation.en: -You don't mind moving, right? -No, I'm fine here.
translation.es: - No le molesta mudarse, ¿no? - Estoy bien aquí.

translation.en: It's just switching umbrellas so my family can be together.
translation.es: Es cambiar de lugar para que mi familia esté junta.

translation.en: I understand that, but I have no desire to move.
You do us this favor today, we'll do a favor for you tomorrow.
translation.es: Hoy por mí, mañana por ti.

translation.en: Honestly, I don't even know what to say to you.
translation.es: La verdad, no sé qué decirle.

translation.en: It's just moving down the beach a few feet.
translation.es: Solo se trata de moverse unos metros.

translation.en: We put you on a diet and you're eating all this cake.
translation.es: Te pusimos a dieta, y estás comiendo este pastel.

translation.en: -You want a piece of cake? -Oh, thank you. No.
[woman] I'm sorry about earlier. All right?
[Leda] You got a lovely big belly.
Well, it's a girl. So, you know.
-And how much longer have you got? -[woman] Two months.
My sister-in-law had hers right away.
translation.es: Mi cuñada tuvo la suya enseguida.

translation.en: These things happen when they're supposed to happen.
No, I mean, where are your people from?
Are from Leeds. Well, Shipley, really.
translation.es: De Leeds. De Shipley, en realidad.
- Qué elegante. - No, no es elegante.

translation.en: I thought you were from Queens. I swear.
translation.es: Pensé que eras de Queens. Te juro.

translation.en: Not 'cause you talk like it, but just, like… something.
translation.es: No por cómo hablas, pero tienes algo.

translation.en: but we have family in this town for, like, 300 years.
translation.es: pero hace 300 años que tenemos familia aquí.

translation.en: Uh, Bianca is 25 and Martha is 23.
I mean, you're too young. You must've started really early.
translation.es: Eres muy joven. Debes haberlas tenido temprano.

translation.en: We were saying before, you couldn't be more than 40.
translation.es: Pensábamos que no tenías más de 40.

translation.en: You're not gonna have a bite? Not even one bite?
-Oh. -How can you hold cake and not eat it?
Look, I'm sorry about earlier as well. I was feeling a bit anxious.
translation.es: Yo también lamento lo de antes. Estaba un poco nerviosa.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you know, the sun can do that.
translation.es: Sí, el sol a veces hace eso.

translation.en: And, well, maybe your girls. Being away from your girls, you know?
translation.es: Y quizá por tus hijas, el estar lejos de ellas.
Los hijos son una responsabilidad inmensa.

translation.en: -Yeah, of course. -I'm glad you made it down here.
translation.es: - Sí, claro. - Me alegra que haya venido.

translation.en: -I hope we didn't disturb you. -[Leda] Oh, no, no.
translation.es: - Ojalá no la hayamos molestado. - No.

translation.en: Oh, I'm fine. I'm still half full.
translation.es: Está bien. Aún tengo la mitad.

translation.en: Nice to have a place like this, just down the stairs.
translation.es: Es lindo tener un lugar así abajo.

translation.en: You know, especially when you're alone.
translation.es: Sobre todo, cuando uno está solo.

translation.en: -Keeps you from eating canned beans. -Or rotten fruit.
translation.es: - Evita que comas frijoles en lata. - O fruta podrida.

translation.en: -Uh, I forget to eat entirely sometimes. -Oh, that's not good.
translation.es: - A veces me olvido de comer. - Eso no es bueno.

translation.en: I saw you at the beach today. Callie's birthday party.
translation.es: La vi en la playa hoy. En la fiesta de cumpleaños de Callie.

translation.en: Oh, well, I wasn't exactly at the party. I didn't see you.
translation.es: No estaba en la fiesta. No lo vi a usted.

translation.en: -You know, you're settling in upstairs? -Yeah. It's great. Thanks.
translation.es: - ¿Se siente a gusto arriba? - Sí, es genial. Gracias.

translation.en: -Yeah? Everything's okay in the apartment? -Yeah, it's great. Thank you.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? ¿Todo bien en el apartamento? - Sí, es genial. Gracias.

translation.en: Did you find that remote? You know, for the fan?
translation.es: ¿Encontró el control remoto para el ventilador?

translation.en: No, I prefer to pull the string to turn it on.
translation.es: No, prefiero manejar los hilos para encender el ventilador.
No, prefiero manejar los hilos para encender el ventilador. Manejar.

translation.en: -The apartment's great. -It's a good one. Bright and white.
translation.es: - El apartamento es genial. - Sí, es lindo. Luminoso y blanco.

translation.en: -Feels like you're on a boat almost. -Yes.
translation.es: - Es como estar en un barco, casi. - Sí.

translation.en: -[Lyle] No, no, I got it. -Oh, no, really.
translation.es: - No, yo invito. - No, en serio.

translation.en: Just let me know if I can do anything for you.
Do you mind if I finish my dinner now, Lyle?
You do whatever the fuck you want. You wanna take care of your baby girl?
translation.es: Haz lo que quieras, carajo. ¿Quieres cuidar de tu bebé?

translation.en: You say you miss us. You wanna come back and you want me. You want this ass?
translation.es: Pides volver, dices que me quieres, que quieres este culo…

translation.en: What? You're such a piece of shit.
[Nina's husband] I'm a piece of shit?
That's our… That's… That's our water gun.
translation.es: Esa es nuestra pistola de agua.

translation.en: It's okay, she's wearing your big hat. We'll find her, okay?
translation.es: Está bien, tiene puesto tu sombrero. La encontraremos.

translation.en: [Leda] Oh. I'll help you find her. Come on.
I just wanted to come say thank you. [clears throat]
I thought I was gonna die.
Thank God you were here. Thank God.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios que estabas tú. Gracias a Dios.

translation.en: Sometimes it's easier for strangers in these situations.
translation.es: A veces es más fácil para los extraños.

translation.en: [Callie] Yeah, I was so crazy, I couldn't see right.
translation.es: Estaba tan fuera de mí que no sabía qué hacer.

translation.en: You know, so many awful things can happen.
-It was a pine cone from the beach path. -[Callie] A pine cone?
translation.es: - Una piña en el sendero de la playa. - ¿Una piña?

translation.en: That looks so awful. Did you put something on it?
Oh, no. No. Oh, I have something for you.
translation.es: No. Yo tengo algo para eso.

translation.en: -I like your bathing suit. -[Leda] Oh, thank you.
translation.es: - Me gusta tu traje de baño. - Gracias.

translation.en: We found her and then she lost her doll.
translation.es: La encontramos, y después perdió su muñeca.

translation.en: I used to have a doll like that. Called Mina.
translation.es: Yo tenía una muñeca así. Se llamaba Mina.

translation.en: Or Mini-Mama, as my mother called her.
translation.es: O Minimamá, como la llamaba mi mamá.

translation.en: -[Callie] How's that? -[Leda] Good, thank you. It's cold.
[Callie] Yes. It's really amazing. It's gonna make you feel so much better.
translation.es: Sí. Es increíble. Te sentirás mucho mejor.

translation.en: Okay, by tonight, you're gonna feel amazing.
[Callie] And let's go. Let's find the doll. I… I can't hear her scream anymore.
translation.es: Vámonos. Busquemos la muñeca. Ya no aguanto oírla llorar.

translation.en: [young Leda whispers] I've got a special gift for you.
translation.es: Tengo un regalo especial para ti.

translation.en: This was Mama's doll when she was a little girl.
translation.es: Esta es la muñeca de cuando mamá era pequeña.

translation.en: -[Bianca] Can I have a cuddle? -[chuckling] You can have a cuddle.
translation.es: - ¿Me das un abrazo? - Te doy un abrazo.

translation.en: because then you'll have nice nails.
[Bianca] Very messy. And you won't get better.
translation.es: Eres muy desordenada y no mejorarás.

translation.en: I'm just gonna close my eyes for a few seconds, baby. Okay?
translation.es: Voy a cerrar los ojos un minuto, bebé, ¿está bien?

translation.en: Can you see what my eye color is?
translation.es: ¿Ves de qué color son mis ojos?

translation.en: [Bianca] Uh, I'll just have to brush your hair.
-You said we would have a date. -I can't just let her cry.
translation.es: - Dijiste que tendríamos una cita. - No puedo dejarla llorando.

translation.en: You've got to… I'll give you a few more seconds to come back.
translation.es: - Dijiste que tendríamos una cita. - No puedo dejarla llorando. Te doy unos segundos para que vuelvas.

translation.en: Here. Why don't you play with Mini-Mama?
translation.es: Toma. ¿Por qué no juegas con Minimamá?

translation.en: You can brush her hair, yeah?
-[Martha] Oh, Mama, come! -I'll be back in two seconds.
I've called you so many times for dinner.
translation.es: Te llamé a cenar muchas veces.

translation.en: What are you sitting on? Bianca!
I gave Mina to you because I trusted you to take care of her.
translation.es: Te la di porque creí que la cuidarías.

translation.en: You know, you can be very thoughtless.
This is my doll. You can't treat her like shit.
translation.es: Esta es mi muñeca. No puedes tratarla como la mierda.

translation.en: -You look like you stayed dry. -Yeah, was it really bad?
translation.es: - Parece que no se mojó. - Sí, ¿fue fuerte?

translation.en: Everybody ran into the cafe, and then it got too crowded.
translation.es: Todos corrieron al café, y se llenó.

translation.en: Umbrellas started blowing away, people's books, towels, yeah.
translation.es: Se volaron sombrillas, libros, toallas, sí.

translation.en: Yeah, and the little girl, Elena, she just… she wouldn't stop crying.
translation.es: Sí, y la pequeña, Elena, no dejaba de llorar.

translation.en: Yeah, she lost her doll or something.
translation.es: Sí, perdió su muñeca o algo así.

translation.en: Yeah, well, your books woulda gotten ruined.
translation.es: Se le habrían arruinado los libros.

translation.en: No, no, I'm studying in Dublin,
and I just work here for the summers, but, uh…
translation.es: Solo trabajo aquí durante el verano.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a bit behind at college.
translation.es: Estoy un poco atrasado en la universidad.

translation.en: You know, I wasted a lot of time.

translation.es: - Veinticuatro. - Justo entre mis dos hijas.

translation.en: [chuckles] I think the correct response is, "Sounds like fun."
Uh, I teach, yeah. Yeah. Comp lit. Italian literature, really.
Right, right, ahem, yeah, comparative literature.
-I saw you know a lot of languages? -I don't know anything very well.
translation.es: - Vi que sabe muchos idiomas. - No sé ninguno muy bien.

translation.en: I also wasted a lot of time. [chuckles]
Do you wanna have dinner with me?
Yeah, I should go shower and change and--
translation.es: Sí, debo ducharme y cambiarme y…

translation.en: No, you're fine as you are.
-I don't have my wallet. -Uh, I'm inviting you. Come on.
translation.es: - No tengo mi billetera. - Yo invito. Vamos.
Vasili es el esposo de Callie.

translation.en: Oh, I thought he was married to the older, heavyset woman.
translation.es: Creí que estaba casado con la mujer mayor, la grandota.

translation.en: No, but that's Callie's aunt, I think.
translation.es: No, pero esa es la tía de Callie, creo.

translation.en: -And Lyle, who looks after my place. -He works for them.
translation.es: - Lyle, el que cuida mi casa. - Trabaja para ellos.
- Y el esposo de Nina es… - Toni.

translation.en: Yeah, he, um, comes up the weekends.
And then they all rent one of these huge villas by the cliffs.
translation.es: Y alquilan una de las casas enormes en los acantilados.

translation.en: -[both chuckles] -They rent the same one every year.
translation.es: Alquilan la misma todos los años.

translation.en: Wow, it's like talking about a film I saw in a language I didn't quite understand.
translation.es: Es como hablar de una película que vi en un idioma que no entendí bien.

translation.en: You watch movies in languages you don't know?
translation.es: - ¿Ves películas en idiomas que no sabes? - Sí.
- ¿Ves películas en idiomas que no sabes? - Sí. ¿Sin subtítulos?

translation.en: And you were saying that, um, your kids are my age?
translation.es: ¿Y dijiste que tus hijas tienen mi edad?

translation.en: Hmm. And do they look like you?
I don't know. It's hard to say, if I'm honest. They probably do.
translation.es: La verdad, es difícil saberlo. Seguramente, sí.
Y tú, un chico muy listo.

translation.en: And, um, when I was about Martha's age, I felt like she hadn't shared it.
translation.es: Cuando yo tenía la edad de Martha, sentía que ella no lo había compartido.

translation.en: Like, in creating me she'd separated herself,
translation.es: Como si, al crearme, se hubiese separado,

translation.en: like pushing a plate away if the food's repulsive.
translation.es: como cuando alejas un plato si la comida es asquerosa.

translation.en: But Bianca and Martha, it's funny.
translation.es: Con Bianca y Martha, es curioso.

translation.en: What I find most interesting are the secret resemblances.
translation.es: Lo que me parece más interesante son los parecidos secretos.

translation.en: So what makes Bianca seductive and Martha not, and vice versa.
translation.es: Lo que hace seductora a Bianca, pero no a Martha y viceversa.

translation.en: Like, when I was younger, I had small breasts.
translation.es: Cuando yo era más joven, tenía pechos pequeños.

translation.en: And then as soon as I gave birth, big breasts.
translation.es: Apenas di a luz, pechos grandes.

translation.en: And Bianca has big breasts, and Martha has almost none, like a boy.
translation.es: Y Bianca tiene pechos grandes y Martha casi no tiene, como un varón.

translation.en: And she doesn't realize how beautiful she is.
translation.es: Y no se da cuenta de lo hermosa que es.

translation.en: And she wears a padded bra and it sort of humiliates her.
translation.es: Usa sostén con relleno, y eso la avergüenza un poco.

translation.en: And she thinks I've given the best of myself to Bianca.
translation.es: Y piensa que le di lo mejor de mí a Bianca.

translation.en: And, um, I do understand. And, like…
Long time ago, at some point, I considered,
only half seriously, considered having implants.
translation.es: consideré, no del todo en serio, colocarme implantes.

translation.en: But, um, they come from nowhere, so what are they worth?
translation.es: Pero no vienen de ningún lugar, entonces, ¿qué valor tienen?

translation.en: and she would never let herself feel deprived.
translation.es: ella nunca se permitiría sentirse desfavorecida.

translation.en: She sucks everything out of me. All my secret skills.
translation.es: Absorbe todo de mí. Mis destrezas secretas.

translation.en: She pointed out I'm finicky about peeling fruit.
translation.es: Dice que soy quisquillosa cuando pelo fruta.

translation.en: I don't like it when the peel breaks. I like when it comes off in one long whatsit?
translation.es: No me gusta romper la cáscara. Me gusta cuando la cáscara queda entera.

translation.en: Didn't even know that about myself.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sabía eso de mí.

translation.en: -Yeah, of course I understand. -[young Leda muttering]
The problem for me is why did they schedule them so close together?
translation.es: El problema es por qué las programaron tan juntas.

translation.en: -[girls crying in distance] -[whispers] It's Sunday. You're on.
-[crying] Please, can you kiss it? -[Leda] Yeah, sit down.
translation.es: - Por favor, ¿le das un beso? - Sí, siéntate.

translation.en: -Mama, please, can you kiss it? -Sit down.
translation.es: - Mamá, por favor, ¿le das un beso? - Siéntate.

translation.en: What did you do that for?
I wanted to peel it like a snake like you do. [sniffles]
translation.es: Quería pelarla como una serpiente como tú.

translation.en: Please. Please, can you kiss it?
[young Leda] I can't leave you alone for one minute.
translation.es: No puedo dejarte sola ni un minuto.

translation.en: There's this great poem by María Guerra.
translation.es: Hay un poema hermoso de María Guerra.

translation.en: Have you ever read "Leda and the Swan"?

translation.es: - Bien. - Además, se llama como yo.

translation.en: "The center cannot hold…" Oh, that's a different… that's a different Yeats.
translation.es: "El centro no puede sostenerse…". Ese es otro de Yeats.

translation.en: My mum used to get quite dizzy.
She, um… Every time she stood up, happened all the time.
translation.es: Cada vez que se ponía de pie. Le pasaba siempre.

translation.en: She said it's 'cause she stood up too fast.
translation.es: Decía que era por pararse rápido.

translation.en: Oh, poor creatures that came out of my belly.
The bits I find most beautiful about them are the bits that are alien to me.
translation.es: y las partes que me gustan más son las que no son mías.

translation.en: So I don't have to take responsibility for that.
translation.es: Así que no asumo la responsabilidad.

translation.en: I hope they find the doll.
I had to rake the entire beach looking for it.
What you did yesterday was amazing.
translation.es: Lo que hiciste ayer fue asombroso.

translation.en: When you wouldn't move from the umbrella.
-But don't do things like that anymore. -Why?
translation.es: - Pero no vuelvas a hacer algo así. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: [young Leda] Sometimes I get scared I can't take care of them.
translation.es: A veces temo no poder cuidarlas.

translation.en: What if I passed out, alone with them when you're in Arizona?
translation.es: ¿Y si me desmayo cuando estés en Arizona?

translation.en: Of course you can take care of them.
I'm just gonna take the dress and the shoes and the socks.
translation.es: Solo me llevaré el vestido, los zapatos y los calcetines.

translation.en: Actually, I'm gonna take the jacket too. Thank you.
Did you use the ointment I gave you?
Oh, for my back. Yeah, it feels much better.
translation.es: Para la espalda. Sí, está mejor.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, sweetie, did you ever find your doll?
-[Callie] Oh, my God. -Elena, do not do that.
translation.es: - Dios mío. - Elena, no hagas eso.

translation.en: Why don't you tell the lady how we're gonna go
translation.es: ¿Por qué no le dices a la señora que iremos

translation.en: and find Neni tomorrow when it's not raining, right, honey?
translation.es: a buscar a Neni mañana, cuando deje de llover, querida?

translation.en: And then today we're gonna get a doll for a big girl.
translation.es: Y hoy compraremos una muñeca para una niña grande.

translation.en: 'Cause you're Mommy's big girl. You're my big girl.
translation.es: Porque eres la niña grande de mami. Eres mi niña grande.

translation.en: Whoever took her should get brain cancer.
translation.es: Ojalá le dé cáncer a quien la robó.

translation.en: [Vassili] Oh, come on. It's kids' stuff, you understand? They like a toy, they take it. That's it.
translation.es: Vamos. Son cosas de niños. Les gusta algo y lo toman. Es todo.

translation.en: [Callie] No, Arruno's children aren't like kids.
translation.es: No, los hijos de Arunno no son niños.

translation.en: Yeah, it's their mom. She's a cunt.
translation.es: Sí, por la madre. Es una perra.

translation.en: [Vassili] I spoke to Toni and the kids didn't take anything.
translation.es: Le pregunté a Toni, y los niños no tomaron nada.
- Bueno, es cierto. - No lo digas.

translation.en: [Callie] She's been through a lot, you know?
She's, like, had a fever, she can't breathe at night.
translation.es: Tuvo fiebre, de noche le cuesta respirar.

translation.en: She needs a Kleenex. We're furious.

[Nina] It didn't mean anything, what you saw.
translation.es: Lo que viste no significó nada.

translation.en: I don't let it go anywhere. I just…
translation.es: No dejo que pase a mayores. Solo…

translation.en: I'm happy with Elena, with-- with everything.
translation.es: Soy feliz con Elena, con todo.

translation.en: I met my husband so young.
translation.es: Conocí a mi esposo muy joven.

translation.en: And he's fucking crazy about me.
He says my breasts are exactly the size of his hand.
translation.es: Dice que mis pechos son del tamaño exacto de sus manos.

translation.en: [Leda] What would he do if he saw you with Will?
translation.es: ¿Qué haría si te viera con Will?

translation.en: I don't want to talk about him.
I only have, like, five minutes before Callie finishes shopping.
translation.es: Solo tengo cinco minutos hasta que Callie termine de comprar.

translation.en: She doesn't want you to talk to me? She doesn't want me to do fucking anything.
translation.es: - ¿No quiere que hables conmigo? - No quiere que haga un carajo.

translation.en: What happened in the toy store?
You were talking about your daughters and then
translation.es: Estaban hablando de tus hijas, y luego…

translation.en: Do you know what I'm talking about?
When the oldest was seven and the youngest was five, I left.
translation.es: Cuando la más grande tenía siete y la más chica, cinco, me fui.

translation.en: I abandoned them and I didn't see them for three years.
translation.es: Las abandoné y nos las vi por tres años.

translation.en: You didn't see your children for three years?
translation.es: ¿No viste a tus hijas durante tres años?

translation.en: Their father and my mum, and then I came back for them.
translation.es: Su padre y mi mamá, y luego regresé a buscarlas.

translation.en: What did it feel like without them?
Felt like I'd been trying not to explode and then I exploded.
translation.es: Sentí que había estado evitando explotar y luego, exploté.
- Ahí están Callie y tu esposo. - ¿Mi esposo?

translation.en: What the fuck is he doing here?
He's not supposed to be here until tomorrow.
[Joe chuckling] What are you doing? Say hello to Mummy.
Martha. Go on. Go say hello.
-[Leda] Can I get a hug? -[Joe] Go on.
Can you wash my hair after dinner?
translation.es: ¿Puedes lavarme el cabello después de cenar?

translation.en: Mm-mmm. I can't stay for dinner, baby. I've got to get on an airplane.
translation.es: No puedo quedarme a cenar. Tengo que abordar un avión.

translation.en: But I brought you presents. Hmm?
You awoke the tickle monster. There's a tickle monster in town.
translation.es: Despertaron al monstruo de las cosquillas. Hay un monstruo de las cosquillas.

translation.en: Bianca? Do you want me to help you do your buttons up in the back?
translation.es: ¿Bianca? ¿Quieres que te ayude con los botones de la espalda?

translation.en: Come on, what do you fucking need? Do need me on my knees?
translation.es: Vamos, ¿qué necesitas? ¿Acaso debo ponerme de rodillas?

translation.en: Do you need me to cut my balls off? What do you need? Tell me.
translation.es: ¿Quieres que me corte las pelotas? ¿Qué necesitas? Dime.

translation.en: Have you got his cock in your mouth, you can't answer me?
translation.es: ¿Aún tienes su pito en la boca que no contestas?

translation.en: Joe, this has nothing to do with that.
translation.es: Joe, no tiene que ver con eso.

translation.en: Congratulations, baby, you're an expert. Huh?
Do you think I'm a fucking idiot? Huh?
Please. Please. Please. Please. Come on.
They're little fucking girls. How am I supposed to do this?
translation.es: Son unas niñitas. ¿Cómo voy a hacer?

translation.en: I'm taking them to your mum's. I can't handle this.
translation.es: Irán con tu madre. Yo no puedo.

translation.en: You bring them back there, and they're going to sink into that black shithole.
translation.es: Si las llevas allí, se hundirán en ese oscuro agujero de mierda.

translation.en: All the fucking shit… that I came from.
translation.es: En la mierda de la que vengo yo.

translation.en: I do think you're an arsehole.
My mother didn't even finish school.
translation.es: Mi madre ni terminó la escuela.

translation.en: Please. Please, can you peel it like a snake?
translation.es: Por favor, ¿puedes pelarla como una serpiente?

translation.en: [Bianca] Please, can you peel it like a snake?
translation.es: Por favor, ¿puedes pelarla como una serpiente?

translation.en: No, I won't let anything break.
translation.es: No, no dejaré que se parta.

translation.en: [Bianca] Do you think that's a land or a sea monster?
translation.es: ¿Crees que sea un monstruo terrestre o marino?

translation.en: Don't let it break. Peel it like a snake.
translation.es: Que no se parta. Pélala como una serpiente larga.

translation.en: Here, you can leave your bag here.
That was a fun night. I think maybe you better go home.
translation.es: Leda, creo que es mejor que te vayas.

translation.en: You know, it was, uh, it was beautiful.
The gift you gave Nina. She was really grateful for your kindness.
translation.es: El regalo que le diste a Nina. Estaba muy agradecida.

translation.en: I have, uh, something to ask you.
-What? -Do you mind if I come up?
Nina was wondering if you would be willing to lend us your place for a few hours.
translation.es: Nina quería saber si nos prestarías tu casa por unas horas.

translation.en: Would you tell Nina I'd like to talk to her?
translation.es: ¿Le dirías que me gustaría hablar con ella?

translation.en: Her husband doesn't leave till Sunday, so before that, it's impossible.
translation.es: Su esposo se irá el domingo, antes es imposible.

translation.en: No, Will, the caretaker knows Nina and has business with her husband.
translation.es: No, Will, el casero conoce a Nina y hace negocios con su esposo.

translation.en: Lyle? You give him €20 and he's not gonna say anything.
translation.es: ¿Lyle? Si le das €20, no dice nada.

translation.en: Why are you asking this of me in particular?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me pides esto justo a mí?

translation.en: -Mommy, get up! -[Nina sighing] Mommy, get up!
-Come to the sea, Mommy. -I'll take her.
translation.es: - Ven al mar, mami. - Yo la llevo.

translation.en: [young man] Do you need a hand with your bags?
My aunt asked me to ask you.
translation.es: Mi tía me dijo que le preguntara.

translation.en: I thought you couldn't come till Monday.
Well, give me a second to get dressed.
translation.es: Dame un segundo, que me visto.

translation.en: Um, no, I-- I have, like, literally a minute. I just…
Uh, I told Callie that I was gonna go and get some nose drops for Elena
translation.es: Le dije a Callie que iba a buscar gotas nasales para Elena

translation.en: because she is always in the water.
translation.es: porque siempre está en el agua.

translation.en: And she can't get rid of her cold, so…
translation.es: Y no se le pasa el resfrío.

translation.en: -Yeah. So, do you want the keys? -[Nina chuckles]
If it's all right with you.
Doesn't have much to do with me.
translation.es: No tiene mucho que ver conmigo.

translation.en: You told me you were happy with your husband.
translation.es: Me dijiste que eras feliz con tu esposo.

translation.en: Yeah, you told me you were happy with everything.
translation.es: Que eras feliz en todo sentido.

translation.en: I think you should do what you want.
translation.es: Que debes hacer lo que quieras.

translation.en: -I'll come see you. -Well, I will leave you my address.
translation.es: - Iré a visitarte. - Te daré mi dirección.

translation.en: I don't know what to call it.
Thought you said you were in a hurry.
If it felt amazing, then why did you go back to your daughters?
translation.es: Si se sentía increíble, ¿por qué volviste con tus hijas?

translation.en: I'm their mother. I went back 'cause I missed them.
translation.es: Soy su madre. Volví porque las extrañaba.

translation.en: I need to give you something else too.
Yeah, it just, um, happens when I stand up too quickly.
translation.es: Sí, solo me pasa cuando me levanto muy rápido.

translation.en: -Where did you find her? -No, I took her.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde la encontraste? - No, me la llevé.

translation.en: Did you think that the doll-- that the doll wasn't good for us?
translation.es: ¿Pensaste que la muñeca no nos hacía bien?

translation.en: I'm leaving tonight. The apartment's gonna be empty till the end of the month.
translation.es: Me iré hoy. El apartamento quedará vacío hasta fin de mes.

translation.en: -Nina, I'm so sorry. -I don't want anything from you.
translation.es: - Lo siento mucho. - No quiero nada de ti.

translation.en: You're so young and it doesn't pass.
translation.es: Eres muy joven, y no pasa.

translation.en: -None of this pass-- [gasps] -You fucking sick cunt.
translation.es: - Nada de esto pasa. - Perra de mierda.

translation.en: [panting] Better watch your fucking back, bitch!
-[Martha] What is that? -[young Leda] It's called a navel.
-[Bianca] Why's it called a navel? -[Martha laughs]
[young Leda] It's called a navel because…
-You know another word for navel? -[Bianca] No.
-[Martha] Belly button! -Belly button, yeah, that's right.
-Fart button! -It looks like a belly button.
translation.es: - ¡El botón de pedo! - Parece un botón.

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -It looks like a belly button.
translation.es: Parece como un botón de panza.

translation.en: [Bianca] That one looks like an outie.
[Martha] And the other one looks like an innie.
-[woman over phone] Hello? -[Leda] Bianca, it's Mum.
[Bianca] I left you so many messages. I thought you were dead.
translation.es: Te dejé tantos mensajes que pensé que estabas muerta.

translation.en: -[Martha laughing] -[Leda] Tell me all about it.
[in unison] Peel it like a snake. Don't let it break.
translation.es: Pélala como una serpiente larga. Que no se parta. Pélala como una serpiente larga.
Que no se parta. Pélala como una serpiente larga.
